original_text: But Moses said, ‘Then you will have to give us animals for our sacrifices and burnt offerings. We need our animals to offer to the Lord our God.
korean_text: 모세가 이르되 왕이라도 우리 하나님 여호와께 드릴 제사와 번제물을 우리에게 주어야 하겠고

sentences.original_text: Then you will have to give us animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 우리에게 동물을 주어야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for our sacrifices and burnt offerings
to offer to the Lord our God
